rComments: Her class was really interesting and she always had positive feedback to give to everyone. The 4 of the essays aren't too bad, but the 5th one is a research paper that's 1500 words minimum. A bit harder because you need academic sources, but overall the class was easy and fun to take.

Veronica is very passionate about what she teaches and she also takes the time to get to know her students. Her assignments are clear and she gives great feedback on essays.  The reading that she assigns is interesting and short. Whether you're a so-so writer or a great writer, she will be able to help you and make you even better.

I took Veronica's Writing 2 class last quarter and it taught me so much about writing. She is very clear and great at teaching you strategies to improve your writing. She doesn't give an overwhelming amount of work or reading, but any that she does is worth your time. If you ever need help, she welcomes you in office hours with a smile!

She genuinely cares about her students and she's enthusiastic about her job. Whenever we get back essays, she gives good feedback and allows us to resubmit essays as many times as we want until the last day of class. She even invited us to visit her next quarter during office hours and to write recommendation letters if needed.
Best Kresge core teacher. Lenient, kind and passionate.

One of the kindest teachers you will ever encounter. Genuinely cares about students, gives constructive feedback, lenient, and makes sure to give you clear directions. As a strong writer, she helped me become even BETTER. She goes over a variety of things that people have difficulty with and is very open to new ideas.

Veronica is such an amazing professor! I had trouble with my writing and she was able to help me a lot. I attended her office hours and she told me how to fix my writing in a respectful way. She really cares about her students I really recommend she will make class fun and easy but she will be very helpful.

Veronica is such an amazing teacher! I learned so much from her and the course. This course was the stepping stone for the rest of my undergraduate writing career. My writing improved so much and I continuously end up referring back to my old notes. If you put in a lot of effort, you'll get great results!
